home.title: Spanish Tax Forms Made Simple
home.subtitle: Fill out Spanish tax forms easily with AI assistance, manual guidance, or PDF upload with OCR.
home.featureAIDesc: Get guided help in filling your forms
home.featureAIDetail: Our AI chatbot asks simple questions to gather your information and automatically fills out the complex tax forms for you.
home.featureManualDesc: Fill out forms on your own
home.featureManualDetail: Take control with our intuitive form interface. Fill in fields at your own pace with helpful tooltips and validation.
home.featureOCRDetail: Upload a previously filled PDF form and our OCR technology will extract the data to pre-fill your new form.
home.step1Desc: Sign up for free to access all tax forms and features.
home.step2Desc: Choose from our library of official Spanish tax forms.
home.step3Desc: Use our AI assistant, fill it manually, or upload a previous form.
home.step4Desc: Get your filled form as a PDF, ready for submission.
home.readyDesc: Start using Spanish Tax Buddy today and save time on your tax forms.
home.secureDesc: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities.
home.secureBullet1: End-to-end encryption for all your data
home.secureBullet2: No data stored on our servers after processing
home.secureBullet3: Compliant with GDPR and Spanish data protection laws
home.reason1Desc: Fill complex forms in minutes, not hours.
home.reason2Desc: Our validation ensures all information is correct.
home.reason3Desc: Simple interface designed for all experience levels.

login.title: Log In
login.description: Sign in to your account to continue

dashboard.title: Your Tax Forms
dashboard.subtitle: Select a tax form to fill out or continue from where you left off.
dashboard.noForms: No forms available at the moment
dashboard.checkLater: Please check back later or contact an administrator.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.uploadDescription: Upload a new tax form (PDF) to the system.
admin.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the tax form
admin.manageDescription: View, test, and delete tax forms in the system.
admin.noForms: No forms have been uploaded yet.
admin.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields and select a PDF file.
admin.pdfOnly: Please upload a PDF file only.
admin.formUploaded: The tax form has been uploaded successfully.

admin.uploadError: An error occurred while uploading the form.
admin.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the form.
admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this form? This action cannot be undone.
admin.formDeleted: The tax form has been deleted successfully.

form.tryAgain: The requested form was not found. Please go back and try again.
form.previewUnavailable: Preview unavailable. Start filling out the form to see a preview.
form.progressSavedDescription: Your form progress has been saved successfully
form.saveErrorDescription: There was an error saving your progress
form.loadErrorDescription: There was an error loading the form
form.progressLoadedDescription: Your previous progress has been loaded
form.pdfErrorDescription: There was an error loading the PDF file

aiChat.title: AI Tax Assistant
aiChat.description: Chat with our AI assistant to fill out your form step by step.

manualForm.title: Manual Form Fill
manualForm.description: Fill out each field manually. Required fields are marked with *.
manualForm.formSavedDescription: Your form data has been saved successfully

uploadForm.title: Upload Existing Form
uploadForm.description: Upload a previously filled PDF form to extract the data automatically.
uploadForm.pdfHint: Upload a previously filled version of this form
uploadForm.dataExtractedDescription: Data has been successfully extracted from your PDF
uploadForm.dataConfirmedDescription: Your data has been confirmed and applied to the form
uploadForm.pdfOnly: Please upload a PDF file only.
uploadForm.processError: An error occurred while processing the file. Please try again.
